attackStats.name: DEX
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/common/maple-warrior.png} tip={Maple Warrior (4th Job)} val={+15%}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/maple-world-goddess-blessing.png} tip={Maple World Goddess's Blessing (5th Job)} val={+400%}> <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/agile-crossbows.png} tip={Agile Crossbows (2nd Job)} val={+20}> <bg src={/class-icons/common/physical-training.png} tip={Physical Training (2nd Job)} val={+30}> <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/illusion-step.png} tip={Illusion Step (4th Job)} val={+80}>

attackStats.name: Attack
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/soul-arrow.png} tip={Soul Arrow: Crossbow (2nd Job)} val={+30}> <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/crossbow-expert.png} tip={Crossbow Expert (4th Job)} val={+30}>

attackStats.name: Crit Rate
attackStats.detail: <bg val={Base +5%}> <bg src={/class-icons/link-skills/adventurers-curiosity.png} tip={Adventurer's Curiosity (Link Skill)} val={+10%}> <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/archer/critical-shot.png} tip={Critical Shot (1st Job)} val={+40%}> <bg src={/class-icons/common/sharp-eyes.png} tip={Sharp Eyes (4th Job)} val={+20%}> <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/bullseye-shot.png} tip={Bullseye Shot (Hyper Skill)} val={+20%}> <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/evasion-boost.png} tip={Evasion Boost (3rd Job)} val={+100% upon activating}>

attackStats.name: Crit Damage
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/reckless-hunt.png} tip={Reckless Hunt: Crossbow (3rd Job)} val={+20%}> <bg src={/class-icons/common/sharp-eyes.png} tip={Sharp Eyes (4th Job)} val={+15%}> <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/crossbow-expert.png} tip={Crossbow Expert (4th Job)} val={+15%}> <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/bullseye-shot.png} tip={Bullseye Shot (Hyper Skill)} val={+10%}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/vicious-shot.png} tip={Vicious Shot (5th Job)} val={+50% of Crit Rate}>

attackStats.name: Damage
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/marksmanship.png} tip={Marksmanship (3rd Job)} val={+15%}> <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/bullseye-shot.png} tip={Bullseye Shot (Hyper Skill)} val={+20%}> <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/explorers/archer/epic-adventure.png} tip={Epic Adventure (Hyper Skill)} val={+10%}> <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/mortal-blow.png} tip={Mortal Blow (3rd Job)} val={+20% with 10% chance}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/maple-world-goddess-blessing.png} tip={Maple World Goddess's Blessing (5th Job)} val={+20%}>

attackStats.name: Final Damage
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/crossbow-mastery.png} tip={Crossbow Mastery (2nd Job)} val={+20%}> × <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/greater-empowered-arrows.png} tip={Greater Empowered Arrows (4th Job)} val={+8%}> × <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/bolt-surplus.png} tip={Bolt Surplus (4th Job)} val={+15%}> × <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/last-man-standing.png} tip={Last Man Standing (4th Job)} val={+10%}> × <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/greater-empowered-arrows.png} tip={Greater Empowered Arrows (4th Job)} val={+4% from buff}>

attackStats.name: Ignore DEF
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/marksmanship.png} tip={Marksmanship (3rd Job)} val={+25%}> × <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/greater-empowered-arrows.png} tip={Greater Empowered Arrows (4th Job)} val={+20%}> × <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/arrow-illusion.png} tip={Arrow Illusion (4th Job)} val={+30%}> × <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/greater-empowered-arrows.png} tip={Greater Empowered Arrows (4th Job)} val={+13% from buff}> × <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/bullseye-shot.png} tip={Bullseye Shot (Hyper Skill)} val={+20%}>

buffInfo.summons: <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/frostprey.png} tip={Frostprey (3rd Job)} dur={[220s]}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/blink-bolt.png} tip={Blink Bolt (3rd Job)} dur={[120s]}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/arrow-illusion.png} tip={Arrow Illusion (4th Job)} dur={[30s]}> <tt src={/class-icons/5th-job/fury-of-the-wild.png} tip={Fury of the Wild (5th Job)} dur={[40s](105s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/5th-job/guided-arrow.png} tip={Guided Arrow (5th Job)} dur={(Toggle)}>
buffInfo.buffCd: <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/bullseye-shot.png} tip={Bullseye Shot (Hyper Skill)} dur={[40s](120s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/archer/epic-adventure.png} tip={Epic Adventure (Hyper Skill)} dur={[60s](120s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/5th-job/maple-world-goddess-blessing.png} tip={Maple World Goddess's Blessing (5th Job)} dur={[60s](120s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/5th-job/vicious-shot.png} tip={Vicious Shot (5th Job)} dur={[30s](120s cd)}>
buffInfo.iFrame: <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/perfect-shot.png} tip={Perfect Shot (5th Job)} dur={[Up to 2s while casting & 1s after casting](60s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/final-aim.png} tip={Final Aim (6th Job)} dur={[360s cd]}>

details: Can be stacked up to 3 times, once for each unique Explorer Archer to reach Master Level

info: To create one, choose the 'Explorers' option in the Character Creation screen and then continue through the story until you reach the town Lith Harbor where Sugar has a quest called 'The Adventure Begins'. Accept the quest and choose the option 'Bowman' when prompted

Continue with the story until Lv. 30 as a Bowman and talk to Athena Pierce to accept a quest called 'The 2 Trails of the Bowman'. Complete the quest by choosing the option Crossbowman and you will be on the path to a Marksman. Crossbowman is the 2nd job of Marksman

build: <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/archer/double-jump-1.png} tip={Double Jump}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/archer/archery-mastery.png} tip={Archery Mastery}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/archer/critical-shot.png} tip={Critical Shot}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/archer/arrow-blow.png} tip={Arrow Blow}>

<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/crossbow-mastery.png} tip={Crossbow Mastery}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/physical-training.png} tip={Physical Training}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/agile-crossbows.png} tip={Agile Crossbows}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/soul-arrow.png} tip={Soul Arrow}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/final-attack.png} tip={Final Attack}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/piercing-arrow.png} tip={Piercing Arrow}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/covering-fire.png} tip={Covering Fire}>

<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/reckless-hunt.png} tip={Reckless Hunt: Crossbow}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/frostprey.png} tip={Frostprey}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/evasion-boost.png} tip={Evasion Boost}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/marksmanship.png} tip={Marksmanship}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/aggressive-resistance.png} tip={Aggressive Resistance}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/blink-bolt.png} tip={Blink Bolt}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/empowered-arrows.png} tip={Empowered Arrows}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/bolt-burst.png} tip={Bolt Burst}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/mortal-blow.png} tip={Mortal Blow}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/pain-killer.png} tip={Pain Killer}>

<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/bolt-surplus.png} tip={Bolt Surplus}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/last-man-standing.png} tip={Last Man Standing}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/crossbow-expert.png} tip={Crossbow Expert}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/piercing-arrow-ii.png} tip={Piercing Arrow II}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/greater-empowered-arrows.png} tip={Greater Empowered Arrows}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/maple-warrior.png} tip={Maple Warrior}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/sharp-eyes.png} tip={Sharp Eyes}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/illusion-step.png} tip={Illusion Step}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/arrow-illusion.png} tip={Arrow Illusion}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/snipe.png} tip={Snipe}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/heros-will.png} tip={Hero's Will}>
details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended: <bp_<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/piercing-arrow-spread.png} tip={Piercing Arrow - Spread}> Piercing Arrow - Spread_<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/snipe-extra-strike.png} tip={Snipe - Extra Strike}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/snipe-reinforce.png} tip={Snipe - Reinforce}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/snipe-boss-rush.png} tip={Snipe - Boss Rush}> Snipe - Extra Strike, Reinforce, and Boss Rush_<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/sharp-eyes-critical-chance.png} tip={Sharp Eyes - Critical Chance}> / <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/piercing-arrow-extra-strike.png} tip={Piercing Arrow - Extra Strike}> Sharp Eyes - Critical Chance OR Piercing Arrow - Extra Strike_>

nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/snipe.png} tip={Snipe/Empowered Snipe (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/piercing-arrow.png} tip={Piercing Arrow/Empowered Piercing Arrow (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/bolt-burst.png} tip={Bolt Burst/Frostprey (3rd Job)}>
notes: Any combination of these skills are good
2 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)<bp_Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time_>

possible.nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/archer/arrow-blow.png} tip={Arrow Blow (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/common/final-attack.png} tip={Final Attack: Crossbow (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/piercing-arrow.png} tip={Piercing Arrow/Empowered Piercing Arrow (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/covering-fire.png} tip={Covering Fire (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/bolt-burst.png} tip={Bolt Burst/Frostprey (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/snipe.png} tip={Snipe/Empowered Snipe (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/high-speed-shot.png} tip={High Speed Shot / Arrow Illusion (Hyper Skill / 3rd Job)}>

content.specialThanks: Special thanks to Auroa, Daxisla, and the members of the Marksman Discord for their help in making this overview!
credits: Boost Nodes Build + Inner Ability + Hyper Passive Build

primary.name: Three Snails
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 7, Damage 40
primary.desc: Throws a snail shell forward that deals fixed amount of damage

primary.name: Recovery
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Recover 72 HP over 30 sec

primary.name: Nimble Feet
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Duration 12, Movement Speed: 20

primary.name: Maple Return
primary.shortDesc: Returns you to Southperry Harbor on Maple Island.\nCooldown: 600 sec

primary.name: Hero's Echo
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, increases Attack Power & Magic ATT by 4% for 2400 sec\nCooldown: 300 sec
details: To obtain this skill, complete the quest <link href={https://maplestorywiki.net/w/Quests/77/An_Arrangement_from_the_Goddess%2E} title={"An Arrangement from the Goddess"}>
Affects all nearby players

primary.name: Arrow Blow
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 11, Damage: 160%, Max Enemies Hit: 5, Arrows Fired: 3

primary.name: Double Jump
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, allows you to jump a greater distance
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice
While in the air, double-tapping the Up Arrow Key activates a vertical jump
Double-tapping the Down Arrow Key will allow you to descend quickly

primary.name: Critical Shot
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: +40%

primary.name: Archery Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Range +120, Movement Speed +30, Attack Speed: +1.\nMax Movement Speed Increased to 160

primary.name: Piercing Arrow
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 36, Damage: 130%, Max Enemies Pierced: 6, Number of Attacks: 4.\nFinal Damage increases by 15% with each enemy pierced, and damage is doubled.
primary.desc: Fires an arrow that pierces through enemies
details: Gains increased %Final Damage (multiplicatively) with each enemy pierced

primary.name: Covering Fire
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 5, if you press and hold the skill key after jumping a certain distance backward, you will attack enemies at up to 105% of damage for 2 sec while in mid-air
primary.desc: Leap backwards into the air and fire a stream of arrows
details: While casting, you will not be knocked back at all (Super Knockback Resistance)

primary.name: Agile Crossbows
primary.shortDesc: Attack Speed: +2, DEX: +20

primary.name: Soul Arrow: Crossbow
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +30. Allows you to attack without consuming arrows.
details: Uses the arrow with the highest Attack to calculate your damage

primary.name: Crossbow Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Crossbow Mastery: +50%, Final Damage: +20%

primary.name: Final Attack : Crossbow
primary.shortDesc: [Final Attack Skills] Has a 40% chance to deal 150% Final Attack damage.
primary.desc: Grants your attacks a chance to deal an additional hit

primary.name: Physical Training
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increase STR by 30 and DEX by 30.

primary.name: Empowered Arrows
primary.shortDesc: After striking enemies with Piercing Arrows 3 times, your next Piercing Arrow will be upgraded to an Empowered Piercing Arrow.\nEmpowered Piercing Arrow - MP Cost: 30, Damage: 230%, Max enemies Pierced: 8, Number of Attacks: 6\n[Passive Effects - Piercing Arrow Damage: +140%p]
primary.desc: After striking enemies with <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/piercing-arrow.png} tip={Piercing Arrow (2nd Job)}> a set number of times, the next <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/piercing-arrow.png} tip={Piercing Arrow (2nd Job)}> will be empowered
details: Also permanently increases %Damage of <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/piercing-arrow.png} tip={Piercing Arrow (2nd Job)}> by a flat amount

primary.name: Frostprey
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, summon Frostprey for 220 sec.\nDamage: 390%, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Freeze Duration: 3 sec.\n[Passive Effects - Defense: +30%]
primary.desc: Summons a Frostprey that fights alongside you
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %DEF
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Bolt Burst
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 90, Damage: 300%, Number of Attacks: 6, Max Enemies Hit: 8\nCooldown: 7 sec
primary.desc: Releases a burst of arrows around you

primary.name: Blink Bolt
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 28. Places a marker that lasts 120 sec.\nUse skill again to teleport to the marker's location. Teleport Cooldown: 2 sec.\nUse the skill again while holding the Down Arrow key to replace your previous marker. Marker Placement Cooldown: 1 sec
primary.desc: Places a marker down that allows you to teleport back to it freely while active
details: While active, pressing the Skill Key again allows you to teleport to the marker
While active, pressing the Down Arrow Key and Skill Key together allows you to move the marker to your position

primary.name: Painkiller
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50, Clear Status and make you immune to it for 1 sec.\nCooldown: 300 sec\n[Passive Effect: Increase Abnormal Status Resistance by 20 and Elemental Resistance by 20%]
primary.desc: Clears all Abnormal Statuses and become immune to them briefly
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases Abnormal Status Resistance and %Elemental Resistance

primary.name: Reckless Hunt: Crossbow
primary.shortDesc: Reduces Avoidability. Critical Damage: +20%

primary.name: Mortal Blow
primary.shortDesc: Grants a 10% chance when attacking to deal 20% increased damage to an enemy. 1% Max HP & MP recovered when triggered.
primary.desc: Grants a chance for your attack to gain increased %Damage
details: Restores some %Max HP/MP when the effect is triggered

primary.name: Aggressive Resistance
primary.shortDesc: When attacking, for 8 sec, 20% of damage dealt will be converted into a barrier. Reduces 60% of damage taken. Able to reduce damage up to 65% of Max HP
primary.desc: When attacking, you create a shield based on a portion of your damage dealt that absorbs a portion of incoming damage

primary.name: Evasion Boost
primary.shortDesc: Dodge Chance: 30%, all attacks following a successful dodge for 1 sec will be criticals, Knockback Resistance: +40%, Max HP: +40%
primary.desc: Grants a chance to dodge attacks
details: Dodging an attack, causes all your attacks to be Critical Hits briefly
Also permanently increases %Knockback Resistance and %Max HP

primary.name: Marksmanship
primary.shortDesc: Monster DEF Ignored: 25%, Damage: +15%

primary.name: Piercing Arrow II
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 42, Damage: 343%, Max Enemies Pierced: 8, Number of Attacks: 5\nWhen piercing multiple enemies, each pierced enemy takes 15% more Final Damage than the previous one.\nArrow Fragment bounces off the first enemy hit, dealing 350% damage 4 times up to 2 enemies.
details: Increases %Damage, Max Enemies Pierced, and Number of Attacks of attack
Now creates fragments off the first enemy hit that damages nearby enemies previously not hit by Piercing Arrow

primary.name: Snipe
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50, Damage: 480%, Number of Attacks: 9\nIgnore Defense: 25%, Bonus Critical Rate: 100%\nEnemies struck are marked and using Empowered Snipe on them deals 320% additional damage 5 times.
primary.desc: Fires a powerful arrow at one enemy and marks them
details: Marked enemies hit by an <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/greater-empowered-arrows.png} tip={Greater Empowered Arrows (4th Job)}> Empowered Snipe are dealt an additional attack
Attack is a guaranteed Critical Hit and has increased %Ignore DEF
Prioritizes enemy with highest max HP within range first

primary.name: Greater Empowered Arrows
primary.shortDesc:
When Piercing Arrow hits 3 times, Empowered Piercing Arrow II can be activated.
When Snipe hits 3 times, Empowered Snipe can be activated.
Empowered Piercing Arrow II: MP Cost: 87. Pierces up to 10 enemies, dealing 427% damage 6 times. Explodes at end trajectory, dealing 280% damage 10 times to up to 10 enemies.
Empowered Snipe: MP Cost: 105. Deals 535% damage 10 times with +25% Ignore DEF and +100% Critical Rate. Striking an enemy marked by Snipe deals 320% additional damage 10 times.
Marked Target: Final Damage +4% for 30 sec, Ignore Monster DEF: +13%.
[Passive Effect] Final Damage +8%, Ignore DEF: +20%
details: Increases %Damage, Max Enemies Pierced, and Number of Attacks of empowered attack
Empowered attack now explodes at the end, damaging nearby enemies

<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/snipe.png} tip={Snipe (4th Job)}> will now also be empowered by using <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/snipe.png} tip={Snipe (4th Job)}> a set number of times<bp_Enemies hit with empowered <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/snipe.png} tip={Snipe (4th Job)}> are dealt an additional attack_>
All Empowered attacks grant a buff upon successful attacks<bp_[Buff]: Increases %Final Damage and %Ignore DEF_>
Also permanently increases your %Final Damage and %Ignore DEF

primary.name: Arrow Illusion
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 70, summon Arrow Illusion with 100000 HP for 30 sec
Arrow Illusion periodically deals 200% damage and pulls in enemies. 70% chance to stun hit enemies for 4 sec.
When Arrow Illusion takes damage, reflect 1200% of damage.
[Passive Effects - Ignore Defense: 30%]
primary.desc: Place an arrow that pulls in and damages nearby enemies
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Ignore DEF
Enemies hit have a chance to be stunned
When the Arrow Illusion is hit, it will deal a counterattack
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Sharp Eyes
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 45, Critical Rate: +20%, Critical Damage: +15%, Duration: 300 sec

primary.name: Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs
details: Unaffected by <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/paladin/combat-orders.png} tip={Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. Only 4th Job Skills can be increased beyond master level while other skills can only be increased to master level. Exceptions: Some special skills, beginner skills, Combat Orders, hyper skills, 5th job skills, and 6th job skills cannot be increased.}/> Combat Orders

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Goddess of Maple World appears\n[Passive Effect: All stats with a direct AP investment increase by 15%]
details: Skill is a passive, the active effect does nothing except displays an animation

primary.name: Crossbow Expert
primary.shortDesc: Crossbow Mastery: +70%. Attack Power: +30, Critical Damage: +15%
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Now grants flat Attack and increases %Crit Damage

primary.name: Illusion Step
primary.shortDesc: DEX: +80, Bonus Avoidability Chance: 30% chance, Damage Taken: -20%, Knockback Resistance: +60%

primary.name: Bolt Surplus
primary.shortDesc: Increases the number of attacks for all multi-hit skills by 1.\nFinal damage increases by 15%
primary.desc: Increases the number of hits per attack of multi-hit skills (by +1) and increases %Final Damage
details: Multi-hit skills does not include summons and 5th Job Common Skills

primary.name: Last Man Standing
primary.shortDesc: Final Damage: +10%

hyperPassive.name: Piercing Arrow - Spread
details: Does not apply to arrow fragments created

hyperActive.name: Bullseye Shot
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200, Duration: 40 sec, Critical Rate: +20%, Critical Damage: +10%, Monster DEF Ignored: +20%, Damage: +20%\nCooldown: 120 sec

hyperActive.name: High Speed Shot
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300, Damage: 450%, Number of Attacks: 9, Enemies Hit: 12\nCooldown: 15 sec
hyperActive.desc: Fires a piercing arrow at enemies in range

hyperActive.name: Epic Adventure
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nApplies to any Explorer class in the party\nCooldown: 120 sec.

fifthMain.name: Perfect Shot
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000. Shooting once, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 2040%, Number of Attacks: 14, Multiple Critical Shot Count: 4
Damage Range: 20% - 100% depending on enemy's proximity to the center of your sights. Ignore Defense: 100%
Duration: 2 sec. Invincible for 1 sec. after skill ends.
Successful hits grant Marked Target for 30 sec.
Cooldown: 60 sec.
fifthMain.desc: Allows you to aim and fire an arrow at enemies using your mouse
details: Attack has 100% Ignore DEF
Damage is based on the enemy's proximity to the center of your sights
Use the Left Mouse Button to attack and Right Mouse Button to cancel the Skill
You are invincible while in casting and briefly after the skill ends
Provides the buff from <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/greater-empowered-arrows.png} tip={Greater Empowered Arrows (4th Job)}> on successful attacks
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Split Shot
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 800, Duration: 72 sec. Landing a hit with Full Burst Shot after using Piercing Arrow, Snipe, Empowered Piercing Arrow, Empowered Snipe, Ultimate Piercing, Ultimate Snipe, Final Aim, or Repeating Crossbow Cartridge causes your arrow to split and attack up to 10 enemies, dealing 1540% damage 5 times.\nIgnore Defense: 25%\nCooldown: 120 sec.
fifthMain.desc: While active, successful attacks from <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/piercing-arrow.png} tip={Piercing Arrow (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/snipe.png} tip={Snipe (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/repeating-crossbow-cartridge.png} tip={Repeating Crossbow Cartridge (5th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/hexa-snipe-3.png} tip={Ultimate Snipe (6th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/hexa-piercing-arrow-3.png} tip={Ultimate Piercing Arrow (6th Job)}/> releases a burst of arrows forward
details: Attack deals increased %Ignore DEF

fifthMain.name: Surge Bolt
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 750, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 1265%, Number of Attacks: 12, Number of Hit Attacks: 2. Makes 2 attacks for 1870% damage after concentration is complete
Additional Monster DEF Ignored: 50%, Additional Critical Rate: +100%
Max Focus Duration: 10 sec
Cooldown: 20 sec
fifthMain.desc: Charges up a powerful arrow that is shot fired when released
details: Holding the Skill Key will charge the Skill<bp_You can charge and activate while using <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/piercing-arrow.png} tip={Piercing Arrow (2nd Job}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/snipe.png} tip={Snipe (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/high-speed-shot.png} tip={High Speed Shot (Hyper Skill)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/repeating-crossbow-cartridge.png} tip={Repeating Crossbow Cartridge (5th Job)}>_Once fully charged, the attack deals increased %Damage_>
Attack is a guaranteed Critical Hit and has increased %Ignore DEF
Provides the buff from <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/greater-empowered-arrows.png} tip={Greater Empowered Arrows (4th Job)}> if the attack lands
Attack will not activate <tt src={/class-icons/common/final-attack.png} tip={Final Attack (2nd Job)}>

fifthMain.name: Repeating Crossbow Cartridge
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 750, Duration: 60 sec, Usable Cartridges: 8\nFull Burst Shot: MP Cost: 150, Cartridge Used: 1, Damage: 1100%, Number of Arrow Attacks: 9, Arrows Fired: 4, DEF Ignored: 25%, Critical Rate: 100%\nCooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: While active, pressing the Skill Key fires a special arrow forward
details: Attack has increased %Ignore DEF and is a guaranteed Critical Hit
There is a limited amount of arrows that can be fired
Prioritizes bosses with the highest HP first
Provides the buff from <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/greater-empowered-arrows.png} tip={Greater Empowered Arrows (4th Job)}> on successful attacks

masteryCore.name: 1st Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/snipe.png} tip={Snipe/Empowered Snipe (4th Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Snipe
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 70, Damage: 670%, Number of Attacks: 9
Enemies struck are marked.
Empowered Snipe - MP Cost: 140, Damage: 635%, Number of Attacks: 10
When striking a marked enemy, Damage: 410%, Number of Additional Attacks: 5
Ultimate Snipe - MP Cost: 140
Damage: 345%, Number of Attacks: 10, Number of Arrows: 2
When striking a marked enemy, Damage: 410%, Number of Additional Attacks: 5
Snipe, Empowered Snipe, and Ultimate Snipe - Ignore Defense: 40%, Bonus Critical Rate: 100%
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: 2nd Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/piercing-arrow.png} tip={Piercing Arrow (2nd Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Piercing Arrow
masteryCore.shortDesc:
Piercing Arrow: MP Cost: 65, Max Enemies Penetrated: 8, Damage: 555%, Number of Attacks: 5
Final Damage for Each Enemy Penetrated: +15% (increase occurs between hits)
Arrow Fragments bounce off the first enemy penetrated, dealing 595% damage 4 times to up to 3 enemies
Empowered Piercing Arrow: MP Cost: 110, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 670%, Number of Attacks: 10
Ultimate Piercing Arrow: MP Cost: 110, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 680%, Number of Attacks: 6. The arrow explodes at the point where it disappears, dealing 440% damage, 10 times, to up to 10 enemies.
[Passive Effect: HEXA Snipe Damage: +90%p, HEXA Empowered Snipe Damage: +150%p, Bonus HEXA Empowered Snipe Damage: +60%p, HEXA Ultimate Snipe: +60%p, Bonus HEXA Ultimate Snipe Damage: +60%p]
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

originSkill.name: Final Aim
originSkill.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1200, invincible during casting
Shockwave Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1560%, Number of Attacks: 7, Number of Shockwaves: 35
Afterwards, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1710%, Number of Attacks: 13, Number of Arrows: 35
Split Shot is triggered up to 13 times upon landing Final Aim.
Cooldown: 360 sec

meta: Marksman is a DEX archer class part of the Explorers. Marksman utilize Crossbows as their primary weapons. For their secondary weapon, Marksman can equip Bow Thimbles
